attributes.action: Mental Health Training for all HC Professionals
attributes.additional_details:
Many of the people in health care are woefully ignorant of mental health issues.

We believe that all people entering the health service should be given comprehensive training and education in mental health so that the provision for the millions of people suffering mental health issues is improved.

1 in 6 workers right now are suffering from depression, stress or anxiety. Mental health is the number one reason for staff absence.

Many of these people suffer in silence due to the woefully inadequate provision in this country.
